title: Baby Animals
subtle: Concept (nonfiction), 32 words, Level A (Grade K), Lexile BR80L
description: What child--or what adult, for that matter--can resist the charm of a puppy, a lion cub, or a lamb? Simple and adorable photos accompany the repeated text patterns. While new vocabulary such as foal and kid may challenge students, the high-interest subject will keep them reading.
reviewWords: calf, chick, cub, foal, kid, kitten, lamb, puppy
comprehension: Main Idea and Details                : Main idea and details
phonics: Consonants                : Associate the letter Kk with the /k/ sound
grammar: Capitalization and Punctuation                : Understand that sentences begin with a capital letter and end with some form of punctuation
wordWork: Content Vocabulary                : Understand words for baby animals
